title: minecraft:behavior.sniff
description: Allows this entity to detect the nearest player within "sniffing_radius" and update its "minecraft:suspect_tracking" component state

cooldown_range.description: Cooldown range between sniffs in seconds Default value: [3.0, 10.0].

duration.description: Sniffing duration in seconds Default value: 1.

suspicion_radius_horizontal.description: Mob suspicion horizontal radius. When a player is within this radius horizontally, the anger level towards that player is increased Default value: 3.

suspicion_radius_vertical.description: Mob suspicion vertical radius. When a player is within this radius vertically, the anger level towards that player is increased Default value: 3.
